item.title: On productive writing
item.description: Writing a paper or dissertation can be very hard. I have had several students going through what they experienced as a daunting challenge. When asking for advise, I used to tell them that I, too, struggled. And I shared bits and pieces how I managed. Last week I finally wrote up those pieces as a whole. Writing modes When you write, there are very different tasks to accomplish. You start with doing your research, reading and reviewing other papers and books.
